title: First Floor 1BR in a VERY QUIET and SAFE building, +PARKING!
posting_body: ['We are offering a beautifully laid out 1BR / 1Ba on the first floor of a very quiet, Clean and Safe building just 1 block from the E 233rd st stop on the #2 and # 5 subway.', 'The Metro North RR is only 2 blocks away.', 'This building is 100% occupied by very respectful, kind, and  courteous working professionals who value like minded neighbors.', ' This apartment features a full size living room with oak parquet floors, a computer nook in the hall area, and a bedroom that will easily fit a queen sized bed , dresser, with plenty of  room to spare.', 'The kitchen and bath have been recently remodeled and they make a nice presentation.', ' Rent includes heat and hot water.', 'Laundry is on site, private  parking for one car is available across the street.', "NOTE: When responding to this Ad please provide the applicants' annual income, credit score and number of persons who will occupy the apartment.", 'Viewings are by appointment.', 'There are no fees to view or rent.']
